description: Pureflex chondroitin sulfate is manufactured exclusively by TSI Group Ltd Bio-Active Ingredients Division. Decades of expertise and continuous improvement ensure the highest, most consistent quality and provide for full transparency to the source of the ingredient. Additionally the chondroitin sulfate factiliy is EU Pharma certified. Pureflex chondroitin is supplied from bovine, porcine, and shark cartilage. There are also low molecular weight and Halal compliant versions available.
